cheatsheet.title: Test for tray dialog and help

intro.description: This cheat sheet will test that cheat sheets can be opened in a tray next to a dialog.

item.title: Open search dialog with tray.
item.description: This is a step with a command which opens the search dialog. Verify that this cheatsheet is opened to the right of the search dialog when click to perform is pressed. You should cancel out of the search dialog.

item.title: Open search dialog without tray.
item.description: This is a step with a command which opens the search dialog. Verify that this cheatsheet is not opened to the right of the search dialog when click to perform is pressed. You should cancel out of the search dialog.

item.title: Open Help Topic
item.description: In the cheat sheet view click on the (?) to the right of this step - the help topic topic4 should be opened.

item.title: Open External Help Topic
item.description: In the cheat sheet view click on the (?) to the right of this step - eclipse.org should be opened.

item.title: Open Context Help
item.description: In the cheat sheet view click on the (?) to the right of this step. The context help for the cheat sheet selection dialog should be opened.
